assistant_greeting: Hello! I'm your SolarVita Fitness Assistant. I can help with workout tips, meal suggestions, and analyzing foods. How can I help you today?
input_placeholder: Ask about workouts, nutrition, or take a food photo...
healthy_food_rating: Great choice! This is a nutritious option.
unhealthy_food_rating: High in calories/fat. Best as an occasional treat.
camera_error: Couldn't access camera. Please try again.
gallery_error: Couldn't access gallery. Please try again.
no_food_detected: No food detected. Please try again with a clearer image.
api_key_invalid: API key not valid. Please check your configuration.
fatsecret_auth_error: Failed to get FatSecret access token. Authentication error.
no_nutritional_data: No nutritional data found for this food.
food_analysis_error: Sorry, I couldn't analyze that food
